articles.description: Wolves news - Nuno's men had been linked with the Trabzonspor stopper, before Ruddy penned a new deal at Molineux
articles.content:
Liverpool have made a bid for one-time Wolves target Ugurcan Cakir, according to reports in Turkey. 
 The Trabzonspor keeper has been linked with a move to the Premier League for a number of months, with Molineux emerging as a potential destination.

articles.title: Serie A season to be completed by August 20 with September 1 start date for 2020-21 - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Italian Football Federation has decided teams in the country's top three tiers must complete the 2019-20 season by August 20, with the 2020-21 campaign scheduled to begin on September 1.
articles.content:

articles.description: Everton could start next season with three new sponsors on their kit
